meta.title: Blue Collar Dev - Local Software and App Development in Bangkok, Thailand
meta.description: Blue Collar Development is a boutique software development house located in Bangkok, Thailand. Specializing in mobile (iOS/Android), hybrid and web app development, Blue Collar creates amazing applications using cutting edge technology to help you bring your concept to life.
meta.keywords: blue collar, boutique software, software development, hybrid app development, mobile app development, website development, local developers, IT consulting, bangkok, thailand

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.location: Blue Collar is located in Bangkok, Thailand, and provides IT consulting services for customers in Bangkok, Thailand. We're also open to remote work.
contact.contactInfo: If you'd like to get in touch with one of our people, please call {phone}, send us an {email}, or use the handy form below and let one of our experts help you today.

apps.title: Apps + PWAs
apps.description: We create amazing experiences for iOS, Android and Responsive Web. Front-end to back-end development, we do it all. With our user-first approach and API-driven architecture, we create apps that can evolve to take advantage of new capabilities.

customSoftware.title: Custom Software
customSoftware.description: Custom software serves the unique processes of your business, solves your specific problems, satisfies your exclusive needs and makes your workflows easier, faster, and more efficient. Our team of versatile custom software developers can architect & develop software for even the most complex business logic & workflow.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: We collaborate with our clients to deliver a professionally designed accelerated mobile website, integrated with high conversion landing pages and the client company's branding. Our talent comes the Bangkok community, all of whom are passionate about building products optimized for both desktop and mobile.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.description: Paid social content is fast becoming the most effective channel for connecting with qualified leads. Blue Collar's team are experts at creating social ad campaigns, with professionally designed, chat-enabled landing pages.

landingPages.title: Landing Pages
landingPages.description: We work with you to deliver a professionally designed accelerated landing pages complete with lead-gen fields, and your company's branding built in. Your landing pages are optimized for mobile usage, but work on desktop as well.

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.description: New to social media marketing? We can get you set up on the major platforms with professional business pages continually updated with quality posts, promotions, and sales announcements to drive engagement with your brand and generate qualified leads.

home.heroTitle: We Build User Experiences That Reel in the Results
home.intro1: At Blue Collar, we use cutting-edge technologies and employ the latest software design methodologies to drive the creation of amazing user experiences.
home.intro2: Our seasoned team of experience experts and software vetrans at Blue Collar Development specialize in helping you reel in the prize catch of your dreams.
home.fishingHint: Hint: Click the fishing rod's handle to catch a Red Snapper! Very tasty!
home.rockIntro1: Don't stop believin! Being a rock star's a journey when you're born and raised in South Detroit.
home.rockIntro2: We'll take the midnight train to your dream.
home.guitarHint: Hint: Click the strings to the beat of "Smoke on the Water".

sexyMobileApps.title: Sexy Mobile Apps
sexyMobileApps.description: Our timeless look and feel and sleek experience will drive your customers wild with desire.

bulletproofSoftware.title: Bulletproof Software
bulletproofSoftware.description: Feature creep, maintenance, and bad actors will try to shoot you down. We stop those bullets so you don't have to.

deliciousWebsites.title: Delicious Websites
deliciousWebsites.description: Our Red Seal software chefs will blow your mind with great plates and great tastes.

phase3.quote: The people at Blue Collar just really want to make sure that their customers are satisfied. I'm looking forward to working with Blue Collar again on future projects.

active24.quote: Working with Blue Collar was a positive experience. Their work was of high standard and their high availabilty made working with them across timezones easy.

carsgone.quote: Blue Collar has done great work with us on Carsgone.com. We recommend Blue Collar as a competent and valuable partner in web development.

jimmyp.quote: Blue Collar designed and implemented an amazing website for our business, combining the effective elements of a solid technical design with the functionality and visual appeal to engage our customers. We've seen an immediate increase in sales and flow through business.

spasation.quote: I would highly recommend Blue Collar!

bincvfx.quote: Blue Collar designed our current application and database for client management and asset tracking. We have also collaborated on several prototyping projects where their participation was enthusiastic and their contributions were innovative and valued.

company.intro1: To survive and thrive in the 21st century's digital battleground, you need the right skills. At Blue Collar, our elite technology warriors build software that's ready for tomorrow's challenges.
company.intro2: Let our seasoned vets guide you on the path to your dreams.
company.backupDescription: To survive and thrive in the 21st century's digital battleground, you need the right skills. At Blue Collar, our elite technology warriors build software that's ready for tomorrow's challenges.
